Name: GunsBox VR
About the game: Have you ever shot a revolver? Now grab one, feel its coldness and weight, install a scope, and make a goddamn perfect shot. Learn how to use and customize different types of guns. Create your own levels and share them with the community. We've created this sandbox for you inspired by the popular VR titles. Playing this game, you will find out more about various guns, their features, and their design. You will get experience in shooting with optic and collimator scopes as well as using special grips and handguards. Your home location includes your personal shooting range. With “Remote Controller”, a special level-editing tool, you can create your own training configuration and level up your skill. For the first game mode, we've created IPSC based competition. You can compete across the globe in IPSC tournaments or create stages and share them with the community. More game modes and mechanics will be added soon. Stay tuned! Key Features: Realistic weapon physics - single and two-handed operation, center of mass (depends on installed accessories), weight, inertia Most frequently used weapon mechanics - semi-automatic, single action, double action, bolt action, pump action, revolvers Weapon accessories and tuning - scopes and sights (optic and collimator), handguards, grips, tactical flashlight, recoil compensators Weapons safety, feeding, and firing features - realistic and accurate implementation VR hands and custom gloves - all interactions have correct hand animations and pose selection Level editor - create your own levels, setup props interactions, share with the community and compete Tournaments and matches with global leaderboards under IPSC rules Designed for all popular VR headsets and controllers Smooth locomotion, snap turns and teleportation supported
